title: Hero MotoCorp Dec sales fall marginally to 3.94 lakh units
description: Two-wheeler maker Hero MotoCorp on Monday reported a marginal decline in total sales at 3,94,179 units for December 2022. The company had sold 3,94,773 units in the same month a year ago, Hero MotoCorp said in a statement. Exports were, however, lower at 12,814 units as compared to 20,288 units in the year-ago month, the company said.
